title: COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping: Hotel Quality, Set of 2 - Down Alternative Microfiber Filled for Back, Stomach, Side Sleepers, Breathable, and Skin-Friendly
descriptions:
Experience the ultimate comfort and luxury with the COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping. This set of 2 pillows is designed with your sleep needs in mind, suitable for back, stomach, and side sleepers. Made with high-quality Down Alternative Microfiber and a plush hollow fiber filling, these pillows are breathable, skin-friendly, and supportive.

The no-shift construction ensures that the pillows retain their shape, providing you with consistent neck support throughout the night. The polyester blend cover adds a touch of elegance and is easy to care for with machine washable and tumble dry features. 

Experience a cool and restful sleep with the cooling technology built into these pillows. Say goodbye to tossing and turning, and hello to a peaceful night's sleep. Order your COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows today and transform your sleep experience!
